programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Crittendon interferes as Hogan tries to help a defecting scientist, whom they were ordered to kill.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan helps Klink fall in love with General Burkhalter's sister to get his mind off not being promoted.

programme.title: Carol Burnett and Friends
programme.sub-title: Guests Tim Conway And The Pointer Sisters
programme.desc: In Stella Toddler, Carol plays an accident-prone woman on a game show "Up Your Income". Then, in Nora Desmond, Carol plays a has-been actress who searches for a replacement for her butler.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Fancy Figures
programme.desc: Martin Ellis is sent to jail for stealing the sum of $300,000. Ellis is later exonerated thanks to evidence discovered by his wife and the real thief, Charles Brewster, is arrested for the theft. Brewster manages to get out of jail on bail but later turns up dead.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A loud-mouthed braggart's boasts attract the attention of aliens.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: "A handsome homicide detective is befriended by four old ladies who invite him for tea and proceed to play out a variation of Arsenic and Old Lace for his benefit."

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: "Walter Richmond is a gullible tennis player with a nose for snooping. He meets a woman named Laura Gild and tries to learn everything about her. His curiosity does not pay off when she and her supposedly dead husband scam him for money."

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: While convalescing in a clinic after a bad car accident, Mannix helps a patient whom a doctor wants to blame for murder.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: Publisher Quigley asks Cannon for help. He believes that hotel proprietor Rawdon has killed six girls. When the seventh victim is found, however, it's Quigley himself who becomes the prime suspect. A lab assistant manipulates the samples used in the framework of the murders.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: While on a cruise, Betty falls for a man who's being targeted by South American street police.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: This episode focuses on drugs, paying particular attention to addiction symptoms.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Police track down a thief who specializes in elderly people.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Malloy and Reed are rendered powerless when a drunken man with no flight experience decides to take a solo flight in a stolen airplane at a busy airport. Later, they try to locate a 17-year-old runaway living in a condemned home with a much older man, engage in a shootout with a convenience store robber and search for a booby-trapped bank safe that has been stolen with a tow truck.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Malloy fears that a boxer who has just been paroled after serving a murder sentence is going to seek revenge against him. Out on patrol, they try to save a man who has been crushed while working under a stolen car, apprehend a liquor store robber who swears revenge against reed, change a flat tire on their patrol car, locate a four-year-old child who locked himself in a refrigerator and become the targets of an ambush.

programme.title: Toon In With Me
programme.desc: "Bill and Toony boogie through 1962!"

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Wally begins to outgrow his "sloppy" phase and becomes much neater. This is noticed by Ward and June who try to encourage Beaver to undergo the same transformation. However, Beaver changing like that just seems too extraordinary of a task.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Ward becomes a bit jealous when Wally and Beaver begin spending time playing basketball at Willie Dennison's house after Willie's dad put up a backboard and a basket. This prompts Ward to do the same thing but it just seems like things are working against him in his quest to be the perfect father.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Glamorous Ghost
programme.desc: Eleanor Corbin pleads amnesia after police find her running and screaming through woods near her apartment building. Her loss of memory is of little help to her when she is later charged with murder.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: Matlock reluctantly agrees to defend millionaire Ellis Blake when he's accused of murdering his daughter's fiancé, Jeffrey Holden, a blackmailing golf caddy.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Virgil Tibbs returns to Sparta and joins the police force as chief of detectives. His arrival is met with resistance from police chief Bill Gillespie - who resents having an officer hired without his approval. Virgil has trouble adjusting to the small, antiquated police force. Tibbs' first case is a racially charged murder case that is soon complicated when the suspect is murdered in his cell.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jim-Bob and Jody open an auto repair place

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: When the parents of a daughter who was raped refuse to accept the girl's baby, Marshal Dillon must find a home for the child.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: When Muley shows up with a pack of hound dogs, Hoss decides to train them to hunt the coyotes that have been preying on the Ponderosa livestock. However, it isn't long before the dogs' real owner shows up, saying they were stolen.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas looks for help when he is shot after witnessing a murder.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas is marked for death: he was foreman of a jury that convicted an Apache.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: "A Bible-quoting marshal joins the wagon train with his prisoner, a young bank robber whom he claims to be trying to reform. He wants the prisoner to atone for his sins by telling the location of the money he hid from his last holdup."

programme.title: Emergency!
programme.desc: John gets ribbed about his cooking. The paramedics go to Catalina to help a diver, where John and a doctor treat the patient in a hyperbaric chamber. Roy and John help a famous chef with a kitchen fire. A youth suffers a serious gunshot wound. The firemen deal with a dust explosion.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: B.J. finds himself attracted to a famous war correspondent, Aggie O'Shea, who has fallen in love with him.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Angered by the way civilian doctors in the States are profiting from the war, Hawkeye presents the Army with a bill for his medical services. Meanwhile, Charles reluctantly demonstrates American medical practices to three Korean medics, and is on the receiving end of their medical expertise.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: On his way to some R&R in Tokyo, a North Korean soldier forces Hawkeye to perform an emergency roadside operation on his buddy.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Members of the 4077th share their impressions of war in response to letters from fourth graders in Hawkeye's hometown. Margaret writes about how there are some patients she will never forget, while the Colonel tells of his days as "Hoops."

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Jeff Pruitt, a farmer from the hills, comes to Mayberry in search of a wife. He enlists Barney and Andy's help and ends up picking Thelma Lou!

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Opie joins a secret club that meets in Jubal Foster's barn. When Jubal burns his own barn down, he attempts to blame the group of boys.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Pearl's efforts to snag Mr. Brewster seem doomed until he makes a ridiculous public proposal.

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.desc: A reluctant Sgt. Carter may be forced to use Gomer as an honor guard, as he's one of the few who owns a dress-blue uniform.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: When a POW is caught at the processing location after Stalag 13, Hogan suspects there is a traitor in the underground. Newkirk and LeBeau help him find out who it is.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: After receiving a "Dear John" letter, Carter asks Hogan if he can escape and get back to his girlfriend.

programme.title: Carol Burnett and Friends
programme.desc: In The Family, Eunice takes care of her injured and demanding friend. Then, in The Wishing Well, Harvey makes a wish and won't tell Carol what it is.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Perjured Parrot
programme.desc: The courtroom action in this episode takes place at a coroner's inquest as a parrot holds the key to freeing suspect Ellen Sabin from blame in the murder of her husband.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An elderly couple visits the New Life Corporation, hoping to transport their personalities into youthful artificial bodies.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: Revenge fuels a husband looking for the man who raped his wife

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: "A bookkeeper decides to come out of anonymity by committing a crime."

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: Mannix lends a hand to a police lieutenant who's pursuing an escaped mobster into the Santa Monica mountains.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: "A serial murder targets Cannon as his next victim. At first the homicide wanted to be finally released from his compulsion to kill. Cannon accepted to help him. But Cannon got too involved in the killer's demands."

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: A comic is suspected of killing the nightclub owner who fired him after his act proved to be a flop.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: A shooting case exemplifies how the police gather—and why they must sometimes withhold—evidence.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Friday investigates a woman's claim that her husband is an armed robber.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Malloy and Reed search for a suspect who frames an employee of a manufacturing plant for theft and then plants a powerful bomb on the premises. They also apprehend two criminals after questioning a suspicious man who is carrying heavy bags down the street, and protect an innocent motorist from a street race that still ends in tragedy.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Malloy and Reed spend a night shift on desk duty after Malloy breaks his wrist and another office worker calls in sick. With the assistance of a new female recruit, they deal with a homesick elderly woman who refuses to identify herself, help a lenient father bail out his son and become suspicious of a man who walks in looking for a wanted fugitive.

programme.title: Toon In With Me
programme.desc: "Bill and Toony time travel back to 1985 to collect some cool stuff."

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Beaver makes a trade with Larry Mondello, a glass doorknob for a chihuahua. Larry had found the dog in his garbage can, so when Beaver brings it home, Ward immediately breaks the news that he's going to place an ad in the lost-and-found and that Beaver probably won't be able to keep the dog. Despite this, Beaver quickly begins to grow close to the little dog.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Ward helps Beaver and Wally build a miniature race car powered by the lawn mower motor, and Ward makes the boys promise not to use it without his supervision. Later, Larry talks Beaver into taking it for a spin, resulting in the boys being pulled over by a traffic officer.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Poison Pen-pal
programme.desc: A casual pen pal relationship leads to insider information and murder.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: Matlock agrees to defend aging clown Homer Fleming after he's charged with the murder of his long-time partner. After asking Conrad to go undercover as a roustabout at the circus, Matlock learns that the deceased had many enemies.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: The investigation into the brutal murders of a young girl and the suspect in her death, leads Tibbs and Gillespie to the son of one of Sparta's wealthiest and most influential citizens. As they come closer to the truth things become dangerous for Virgil.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Stanley Perkins is retired and returns to the mountain to see Rose

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Gunfighter William Talley is hired by a farmer's coalition in Dodge to kill rancher Shaw Anderson, their main obstacle in taking over land they want.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: When her husband is murdered, Hallie Shannon is convinced that her former sweetheart, Joe Cartwright, committed the deed so they could be together again.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Trouble brews at Lucas' when a whisky salesman and a gunfighter fall for the same woman.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Two pranksters write away for a mail-order bride, using Lucas's name.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: "A woman and three companions in a runaway wagon are rescued by a winemaker and Charlie. They are against the consumption of alcohol and join the wagon train. However, she begins to fall for the winemaker until she learns his trade."

programme.title: Emergency!
programme.desc: An elderly woman's stomach problems lead to a family brawl. Roy and John treat a drunk in a hotel with a broken elevator. Doctors treat a boy with meningitis. Paramedics respond to a two-car accident with no victims, treat a man who fell in the bathtub and rescue a child trapped in a burning building.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: A jilted Italian soldier, Corpsman Ignazio De Simone, is smitten by Margaret; Klinger pours a cement floor in the operating room to fight the spread of germs.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Margaret has trouble pretending she's a chip off the old block when her dad, blood and guts "Howitzer" Al Houlihan, arrives for a visit. Also, Hawkeye fixes up a soldier who repays them with a large side of steak, but the general who it belongs to is really steamed.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Klinger is so depressed by news that his ex-wife plans to remarry, he reenlists for an additional six-year stretch. Meanwhile, a male nurse has a gripe against the Army.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Winchester takes command during Potter's absence; and B.J. and Hawkeye try to convince the Marines to grant a hardship discharge to an immigrant soldier, Private Jost Van Liter.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Rich kid Ronald Bailey is jailed when he blatantly defies the law. As Bailey waits for his influential father to bail him out, Andy teaches him the lesson of self-responsibility.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: A beautiful manicurist from the city comes to Floyd's to set up shop. She makes all the wives in town extremely nervous as she manicures their husbands.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed is confronted with too many cooks and not enough vittles when he invites Pearl and Jethrine to Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.desc: Gomer tries to prevent Sgt. Carter and his long-time friend from becoming enemies.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan hijacks a German bomber, and plans to use it to destroy an oil refinery and foil a German general who knows about the his operation.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Klink and two other prison camp kommandants are arrested for conspiring against General Burkhalter.

programme.title: Carol Burnett and Friends
programme.desc: In The Family, Mama and family visit Hollywood to see her son. Then, in The Lady Heir, the gang parodies the classic film "The Heiress", with Carol as Olivia de Havilland and Roddy as Montgomery Clift.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Shattered Dream
programme.desc: Sarah Werner asks Mason to find her husband, Hugo Werner, who ran off with her inheritance. Hugo, now using the name Hans Breel, is working on a gem scam but his scheme backfires when he is murdered and Sarah is charged with the crime.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: An alien crash-lands in a remote mountain village, stirring up fear and animosity among the villagers.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: When a woman finds a bomb in her car, it convinces her that her husband loves her.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: "Three women have been strangled. Police arrest a stocking salesman as the killer. Mr. Morgan knows who the real culprit is: he has seen the next murder in a dream. He tries to tell people, but no one listens. His wife ignores him as well, which is unfortunate because she is the strangler's next victim."

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: A young boy asks Mannix to prove that his hero did not die from a hit-and-run accident but rather was murdered.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.sub-title: He Who Digs A Grave: Part 2
programme.desc: A lady journalist is forced to reveal her sources in a murder news or she will go to jail on a contempt charge. She enlist Cannon's service to unravel the murder of a missing excursionist.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: A columnist writing about prostitution focuses on a murdered girl whose reputation Barnaby is trying to save.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: The pregnant Betty Jo is ready to have her baby, but problems arise when Wendell, the conductor, won't wake up and Betty Jo has to drive the train herself.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.desc: Betty Jo and baby return from the hospital for a stay at the Shady Rest, where they are to be looked after by Dr. Granny Clampett, a kooky distant relative whose nearsightedness finds her mistaking Dog for the baby.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: It is Tonic Time, and Granny has made a small batch, which is enough for the family and a few friends. She also hopes that she can tonic a man for Elly May to marry. Though Elly may not have a husband in her future, Jane thinks she does. She thinks that Professor Biddle will propose to her, but he reveals all he wants her to do is hatch a condor egg. Granny heads to the bank to get Jane and Drysdale to give Dash Riprock some of her tonic.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts leave Hooterville after spending Thanksgiving there. They return to their mansion, telling Drysdale and Jane about the boy Elly started dating. When Drysdale hears of this, he decides to get a country boy to come and court Elly. He employs Dash Riprock to play country boy Homer Noodleman. After the Clampetts are introduced to Homer, Granny wants to meet his father.

programme.title: Popeye and Pals
programme.sub-title: A Jolly Good Furlough, Learn Polikeness, Popeye Makes A Movie
programme.desc: "Popeye's four little nephews welcome him back from the war zone with a home front defense drill that nearly wrecks him., Olive tries to make a gentleman out of Popeye by taking him to Bluto's school of etiquette., Popeye and Olive make a movie for his nephews."

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.sub-title: Bowling Alley Cat, Little Tinker, Sufferin' Cats
programme.desc: "Tom and Jerry are at the bowling alley as mayhem ensues., A young skunk is looking for a girlfriend but his odor is too much for most females to handle., Jerry is a prize to be won between Tom and an alley cat because neither feline wants to share him."

programme.title: The Woody Woodpecker Show
programme.sub-title: The Screwdriver, Meatless Tuesday, Davey Cricket, Get Lost, Maw And Paw, Polar Pests, Barber Of Seville
programme.desc: "Woody is driving erratically and a slow-witted policeman tries to apprehend him., Andy unsuccessfully tries to roast Charlie Chicken for his meatless Tuesday dinner., Charlie tries unsuccessfully to silence a crickett in his house., Woody's niece and nephew find themselves in a Hansel and Gretal situation with a hungry cat., Milford, the family pig, wins a new car for the family, but no one knows how to drive it., Chilly tries to avoid becoming a replacement penguin at the zoo., Woody goes for a haircut. When he sees the barber isn't in, he attempts to cut his own hair and that of the other clients."

programme.title: Bugs Bunny and Friends
programme.sub-title: Knights Must Fall, Lovelorn Leghorn, Hare Tonic, Scent-imental Over You, Daffy Flies North, Knight-mare Hare
programme.desc: "In medieval times, for the horrendous act of tossing a half- eaten carrot into a suit of armor, Bugs Bunny is challenged to a duel by Sir Pantsalot of Drop Seat Manor. , Foggy is being attacked by the dog, but turns the situation into a football match. , Elmer Fudd takes Bugs home for his "wabbit stew"., On Park Avenue and 86th Street, all the fancy dogs except a little female Mexican hairless are sporting new coats. , Daffy needs to go south, but he doesn't want to fly. Instead he tries to find alternate means of getting there. , An apple falls on Bugs' hairdryer sending him back to medieval England."

programme.title: The Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Assigned to protect Stefan, who is to be crowned king in place of his late brother, the agents must deal with the sinister Mr. Talamantes. Talamantes wants Stefan to renounce the throne and will do anything to accomplish this goal. This includes kidnapping Stefan's daughter, Leandra, and manipulating her to do his bidding whenever she hears or reads a certain word.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: "The wagon train finds Sam Darland with orphan boys in an old ghost town. Hale tries to convince Darland that it is not safe to stay in the town, as it in the midst of Indian territory and the leader of the tribe has been on the warpath."

programme.title: The Big Valley
programme.desc: Jarrod welcomes an old law school friend to the valley, only to find that a secret service agent is on his trail. It seems that every place the friend travels, counterfeit money comes into circulation.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: After being raped, Dodge City school teacher Sarah Merkle struggles with the implications of being an unwed mother.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Singer Hoyt Axton guest stars as drifter Howard Mead, whose singing skills are matched only by his predilection for running afoul of the law. While trying to straighten Mead out, Adam Cartwright is forced to defend his new friend against a robbery charge.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas recognizes Dr. Simon Battle as an ex-gunslinger with whom he once traded shots.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: A Chinese man and his son fight prejudice as they try to open a laundry in North Fork.

programme.title: Rawhide
programme.desc: In return for letting the herd cross her land to get to water, E.J. Farragut wants Favor to hire a woman's grandson, Billy.

programme.title: Have Gun, Will Travel
programme.desc: The Army asks Paladin to find an Army colonel who disappeared with his Apache wife. There are rumors of an Army officer working with the Apaches and inciting them to war. Paladin is asked to find and stop him at all costs.

programme.title: Wanted Dead or Alive
programme.desc: Josh and Brace Logan are met on the range by a group of men who want Logan, Josh's prisoner. When the men take Logan by force, Josh goes to town to file a complaint. He's surprised to find the sheriff was the leader of the men. Josh is now determined to find the truth about the situation before Logan is lynched.

programme.title: The Three Stooges
programme.sub-title: Punch Drunks, Horses' Collars, From Nurse To Worse, All The World's A Stooge, Cactus Makes Perfect, I Can Hardly Wait
programme.desc: "Moe is a boxing promoter looking for a good fighter. , The Stooges are private detectives in the old West trying to help a girl recover an IOU from a bad guy. , The Stooges are defense workers who have trouble getting to sleep when Curly gets a toothache. Moe and Larry try various ways to remove the offending tooth, but nothing works so they take Curly to the dentist. While Moe gets in the chair to show Curly how easy it's going to be, the dentist enters and pulls Moe's tooth by mistake. Curly then wakes up and realizes its all been a dream and a punch to the mouth from Moe dislodges the tooth. , The stooge's friend Jerry convinces them to take out on insurance on Curly and then have him act insane to collect. Moe and Larry put Curly on a leash and take him to the insurance doctor and have him act like a dog. Unfortunately, the insurance doctor wants to perform a brain operation (Cerebrum decapitation). The boys try to escape by hiding in the dog catchers wagon, but are caught and taken to the hospital. They escape again, this time by rigging a sheet to a gurney and sailing down the street, where they run into Jerry and knock him into wet cement. , The Stooges are window washers who lose their jobs after Moe impersonates the dentist in whose office they were cleaning. On the run, they are hired by a millionaire to pose as children. It seems the man's wife wants to adopt some refugees to impress her society friends. Moe is Johnny, Curly is Frankie and Larry is Mabel. Everything goes fairly well as the lady shows off the Stooges to her friends, but they finally irritate her husband so much that he goes after them with an ax. , The Stooges are living with their mother who persuades them its time to leave home and seek their fortune. After a con man sells them a phony deed to a lost gold mine, the boys head west to find the treasure. After some mishaps with Curly's gold finding invention, they locate the mine and strike it rich. When two crooked miners try to take their gold they hole up in an abandoned hotel and, although they get bombarded by dynamite, triumph over the crooks. "

programme.title: Svengoolie
programme.desc: "The first human expedition to Venus returns to Earth in a crash landing off the coast of Italy. The only survivor is Hopper and he's frightened that he may have lost a canister holding specimens of Venusian life. 20 million miles to Earth is Ray Harryhausen's signature special effects story of a terrifying monster from Venus running wild and wreaking havoc in Italy."

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: Mr. Freeze obtains the instant ice formula and builds an Ice-Ray to freeze the entire country! To prove his word, he ices down various parts of Gotham.

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: Kirk and his crew find themselves at the mercy of powerful individuals who possess mind-over-matter powers and plan to use the Enterprise crew for their twisted entertainment.

programme.title: Kolchak: The Night Stalker
programme.desc: The first based on a Native American legend, a Diablero shaman spirit murders for jewels to pay back his debt and be released from his Earthly bonds.

programme.title: Lost in Space
programme.desc: Dr. Smith and the robot are exploring a cave. Smith pushes several buttons on a conspicuous control panel. The buttons activate a cyborg-creating device. It is up to Will to stop Dr. Smith.

programme.title: Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea
programme.desc: "The Seaview searches the ocean floor for the force that caused an aborted missile launch."

programme.title: Land of the Giants
programme.desc: The Spindrift is drawn through a space warp and crashes on a planet where everything is twelve times larger than Earth. They must quickly learn to deal with a hostile environment while becoming the target of giant scientists who want to capture and study them.

programme.title: The Time Tunnel
programme.desc: In 13th-century England, Tony and Doug join Robin Hood's revolt against evil King John.

programme.title: The Invaders
programme.desc: A police shooting causes Vincent to investigate a possible alien encounter with hidden secrets.

programme.title: The Powers of Matthew Star
programme.desc: "Asylum escapees endanger Matt's classmates as they travel to an outdoor survival course."

programme.title: Saved by the Bell
programme.desc: On graduation day, Zack discovers that he is one credit short of getting his diploma, and the only way he can earn it is by doing the unbelievable—BALLET!

programme.title: Saved by the Bell
programme.desc: Mr. Belding and the class of 2003 find a video time capsule from the class of 1993. The video shows the funny and the touching moments Zack and the gang shared with each other.

programme.title: Saved by the Bell
programme.desc: Zack starts high school ready to woo longtime crush Kelly, but A.C. Slater stands in his way.

programme.title: Saved by the Bell
programme.desc: After Zack spies on Kelly, trying to hear who'll she'll take to the dance, she sets up a prank to get even.

programme.title: Saved by the Bell
programme.desc: Trying to cheer Screech up so he'll complete their science project, Zack pretends to know a girl who is interested in him.

programme.title: Saved by the Bell
programme.desc: After a freak accident, Screech can predict the future, an ability Zack uses to his advantage.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch
programme.desc: It's the beginning of another school year, and Marcia panics about becoming a freshman, going as far as pretending to be sick. However, after Mike and Carol see through her act, they insist she'd enjoy school if she were involved in extracurricular activities. Marcia then proceeds to join every group or club available. Meanwhile, Peter tries to build a model volcano on the patio.

programme.title: The Brady Bunch
programme.desc: The boys trick Jan and Cindy into thinking they've seen a ghost. The girls plot their revenge, but it's Alice, Carol and Mike who mistakenly end up as their victims.

programme.title: Happy Days
programme.desc: After getting a "D" on a paper for his investigative reporting class, Richie decides to do a story about the corrupt sanitation department, which is forcing Howard to pay a weekly surcharge.

programme.title: Laverne & Shirley
programme.desc: Desperate for money, Laverne is offered a job at Ajax Aerospace by one of Frank's old Army buddies.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: After a series of mishaps, Henry Bennett gets a reputation in town as a jinx. The more Andy tries to dispel the rumor the deeper the hole gets, until Henry decides it would be best if he left town altogether.

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Ricky and the Mertzes rehearse for pregnant Lucy's trip to the hospital. It turns out to be predictably chaotic, but Lucy does deliver Little Ricky.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: While playing baseball in the street with Wally, Chester and Tooey, Eddie hits a baseball through the Cleaver's window resulting in Ward forbidding the boys to play baseball so close to the house. However, later, Beaver talks Wally into pitching one, and this results in a broken car window.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: After a week-long visit with their Aunt Martha, Wally and Beaver prepare to head home to Mayfield on a train. After talking Martha into letting them buy their own tickets, they discover they're short the money after spending it on junk food and find themselves wondering how they are going to get home.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny and Jethro return to Elly and Jed after visiting Pearl back home. Granny returns with presents and a new device, a telephone. For Granny, this phone is high tech. She gets Jethro to install it, but he installs wrong, connecting wires to a light pole instead of a telephone pole, electrocuting himself, causing it to blow up and making Granny go temporarily deaf.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny enters Elly in a soup-making contest, with her own Snider Surprise soup. When Jed finds out Granny cheated, he demands that she pull Elly May out of the contest. But Granny refuses to because this is a way to get Elly a husband. She tricks Jed into believing she got Elly out of the contest and gets him to go hunting, just in time. The men from Savory Soup visit the mansion and are amazed by the beautiful Elly, thinking she’d be a beetle.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.sub-title: It's A Bird, It's A Plane
programme.desc: A U.S. Air Force jetpack washes ashore in the lagoon.

programme.title: Gilligan's Island
programme.desc: The Professor sees the arrival of a homing pigeon on the island as an opportunity to be rescued.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: After Naomi takes out a large life insurance policy on Vint, Mama and Iola think Naomi is trying to kill Vint for insurance money when he suffers a series of household accidents.

programme.title: Mama's Family
programme.desc: After Aunt Effie falls off the roof, she is stuck in a trance-like state.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.sub-title: Good Time Girls / Iron Man / Soap Star
programme.desc: Three college women are mistaken for prostitutes; a fitness expert suffers fainting spells during triathlon training; a soap-opera star's jealous friend "auditions" for a new part with the lecherous costar.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: State police come to town in search of payroll robbers. They want Andy and Barney to stay out of the way, but end up needing them more than they thought.

programme.title: Collector's Call
programme.desc: "As a child, some of Henry's favorite memories are sitting together with his family and watching their favorite TV shows from the 70's and 80's. As an adult, he decided it would be cool to own costumes from some of the shows he loved best. These days, Henry is a well known collector of TV costumes and props, so having Lisa Whelchel in his home and being able to show her something she may have worn on Facts of Life, which is coincidentally, one of Henry's alltime favorite shows, was definitely a "pinch me" moment for our collector. A Laverne & Shirley skirt, a Peg Bundy top and a Carol Burnett dress are just a few of the iconic TV costumes Henry's managed to get his hands on. You might recognize our expert Stewart, as one of our collectors' from last season and someone with his own impressive collection of TV costumes and props.Stewart appraises Henry's collection and brings along one of his special costumes in the hopes that Henry will want to make a trade."

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Hawkeye uses a bottle of vintage wine to lure unsuspecting nurses into his den; and Potter tries to secure a different sort of anesthetic when the army threatens to ban a painkiller.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Klinger saves Winchester's life when an explosion rocks the operating room; and B.J. is reluctant to reveal the extent of his injuries after the blast.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: Edith finally confronts the waitress who tempted Archie's fidelity after Harry unwittingly hires her to work at Archie's Place.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: Edith is arrested for passing phony $10 bills she got from Archie's Place.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: After Mike and Gloria cancel their trip home for Christmas, the Bunkers decide to travel west for the holidays.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: The Bunkers head out to California for Christmas to find out that Mike and Gloria are having marital problems.

programme.title: Carol Burnett and Friends
programme.sub-title: Goodbye Charlie / As The Stomach Turns
programme.desc: In Goodbye Charlie, Tim writes a eulogy for his best friend, only to discover he was wooing his wife. Then, in As the Stomach Turns, Carol's daughter comes back to life as a Bionic Woman.

programme.title: Carol Burnett and Friends
programme.sub-title: Guests Steve Lawrence And Sally Struthers
programme.desc: In The Boring Twenties, Carol and the gang parody the classic film "The Roaring Twenties", following a singer in a dumpy bar.

programme.title: The Dick Van Dyke Show
programme.desc: Richie's teenage babysitter has a crush on Laura.

programme.title: The Dick Van Dyke Show
programme.sub-title: A Vigilante Ripped My Sports Coat
programme.desc: Crabgrass leads to crabby neighbors as Rob and Jerry start a feud.

programme.title: The Honeymooners
programme.desc: Ralph writes a speech because he thinks he's going to be Raccoon of the Year—but it turns out Norton receives the honor.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A ventriloquist is convinced that his dummy is not only alive but also evil.

programme.title: The Alfred Hitchcock Hour
programme.desc: A man wakes up with a hangover, an unknown woman in his room and his wife lost.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: Barney manages to make his way to the vault despite his blindness and replace the real jewels with fakes. Paris disguised as Nicolai slips Francesca a gun and she fake-shoots herself at the altar.

programme.title: The Fugitive
programme.desc: A forest fire prevents access to a local hospital. Kimble, now a farm laborer, decides to risk blowing his cover when he elects to help deliver a woman's baby at the labor camp. When the news of Kimble's charitable act is reported to the press, Gerard get

programme.title: Harry O
programme.desc: "The carnival atmosphere of an amusement park adds a bizarre twist to Harry O's attempt to save a little girl's life and prevent a gangland murder."

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Friday and Gannon confront a phony magazine salesperson.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: It's a job half done when police nab a narcotics manufacturer: they still need his backer.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Malloy and Reed witness a young hispanic man save a trapped watchman from a burning warehouse, but become suspicious when he resists numerous attempts of private and public commendation. They also try to prevent a drunken man from falling out a window, and resuscitate a man with a heart condition.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Reed has to deal with the consequences of forgetting to roll up the window on the patrol car before he left it. Back on patrol, Malloy and Reed search for an estranged husband who kidnaps his own child, deal with an elderly man who tries to pay for a meal with trading stamps, engage in a shootout with an escaped prisoner caught napping on a city bus and pull over a hijacked delivery van full of booze.

programme.title: Toon In With Me
programme.desc: "Bill and Toony pay tribute to trailblazing African American women."

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Wanting to be liked by Wally's friends, Beaver makes up a wild story about the vacant lot next to his house being an Indian battle ground. After making a bet with Eddie, Beaver has Wally help him plant artifacts in the lot. However, that is forgotten when the kids make a discovery that they believe will make them rich.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: After a weekend spent at the movies goes awry for Ward, he decides the boys should spend their weekends outside and plans a camping trip. However, when Ward's called into work, Wally and Beaver decide to camp out in the backyard.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Mystified Miner
programme.desc: Mason tries to clear his young, beautiful client after a twisting and wheeling plot of murder, kidnapping and embezzlement unfolds.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: When a prison guard is accused of murder, Matlock goes into the prison to defend him.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: The affair between the husband of a wealthy woman and her distant cousin leads to her murder. Virgil immediately suspects the pair. But he has a difficult time persuading Gillespie, who is a longtime friend of the man and Bubba, who has been seeing the cousin. Bubba and Virgil clash again and Virgil is frustrated when the Chief rejects his theory about the crime.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Another new minister begins at Walton's Mountain. The church is in disarray, but he gets the community involved.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Buck Henry Woolf is on the trail of his uncle, who killed his father, stole their money and wounded him. Festus is on the same mission and also to stop the young man from taking the law into his own hands.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben's noisy sons are keeping him from sleeping, prompting a trip to the hotel in town. But rather than finding sanctuary, Ben is bothered by more noise and other irritations that prevent him from a good night's rest.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: While Lucas and Mark are traveling across the Mexican desert they encounter a trio of Mexican bandits. They demand payment from Lucas for crossing "their" desert. Lucas refuses. In retaliation, the three slam Lucas in the throat with his rifle, strip him of all his possessions (including Mark), tie him to a tree and leave him to die of thirst and exposure.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Lucas tries to find out why Mark has taken a job as a stableboy.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: "A sea captain traveling west haunted by nightmares from his past is found stranded, injured and drunk by Bill and Charlie. After hearing his story, they help him reach his destination to locate a ghost: a dead sailor that may be alive."

programme.title: Emergency!
programme.desc: En route to a rescue, Roy and John supposedly sideswipe an elderly crossing guard. A couple on their way to a wedding hits a fire hydrant. A burning camper drives up to the station house. A truck carrying insecticide overturns.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Margaret develops a case of prickly heat, Charles does his tax returns and Klinger takes the P.A. apart—just some of the events that occur during another unendurably hot night at the 4077th.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Klinger's army newspaper reports on Hawkeye's monument to military stupidity; a giant tower made from a half million erroneously shipped tongue depressors.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Hawkeye wagers that he can go a full day without a wisecrack, and Winchester finally confronts the major who exiled him to the 4077th.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Winchester is sent to inspect sanitary conditions on the frontlines, while the rest of the camp plans a surprise anniversary party for B.J.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Opie has his heart set on winning a medal in a foot race at the town picnic. When he loses, he exhibits poor sportmanship. Andy teaches him a lesson about being a good sport.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: When the awful sound coming from the Mayberry choir is narrowed down to Barney, the members decide they must get rid of him, but no one has the heart to do it. They devise a plan with an allegedly super-sensitive microphone.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Pearl is trying to give Granny a break, figuring that Granny is so old and feeble that she cannot perform her household chores anymore. This upsets Granny greatly because she knows she can still get the job done. Granny chases after Pearl, and Jed decides to get the family to relax by taking them sightseeing around Beverly Hills.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: The mobile state museum is brought to Mayberry for Founder's Day. Goober and Warren stand guard and end up firing the old Civil War cannon at two burglars.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: A German officer threatens to expose Hogan unless he is paid a million dollars in diamonds.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Hogan is ordered to give a German general a briefcase containing a time bomb to assassinate Hitler.

programme.title: Carol Burnett and Friends
programme.sub-title: Guests Jean Stapleton And Phil Silvers
programme.desc: In Tacky Lady, Carol sings dressed as Cher. Then, in TV Commercials, Carol and the gang parody TV products, including Boritos Corn Chips, Zerts, Moe DiMaggio, Meannen After Shave Lotion, Drop-off, Bruce Hancock, Kleenies, Nite-O-Quill, Coffee, and Irregularity. Next, in The Old Folks, Carol thinks Harvey forgot their anniversary. Finally, in Hallway Encounter, a woman-libber holds her ground against her complaining boss.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Borrowed Brunette
programme.desc: Eva Martell is hired out of numerous candidates by Melvin Slater to impersonate a woman named Helen Reynolds. Eva is paid extremely well and given a nice apartment for assuming the identity of Helen.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: When a newlywed couple visit the groom's childhood home, the ties of the past prove too strong to resist.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A woman learns that a winning sweepstakes ticket is in the suit her husband was buried in.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A man murders his lover's husband to have her for himself.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: Mannix is hired to find a stolen briefcase containing bribery money in a mob murder case.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: A rich lady, Cecilia Lasher, hires Cannon to locate the son her husband abandoned years before. She turns to Cannon after being blackmailed and terrorized.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: Betty responds to an SOS from her teacher friend, only to find her dead.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Friday and Gannon set out to muzzle thieves who steal dogs and then collect hefty rewards from the owners.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Working with the slimmest of leads, police attempt to identify a woman's body.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: Malloy and Reed are in for a rude awakening when they report to the home of a former professional wrestler on a domestic abuse call. Later, they become suspicious of an apartment burglary victim after they find one of the suspects dead, deal with a man who discovers car parts that were stolen from him installed on another car and become involved in a shootout responding to a bank robbery.

programme.title: Adam-12
programme.desc: A wealthy businessman openly offers malloy and reed security jobs at three times their current salaries if reed agrees to withhold damaging testimony against his troubled son. In the meantime, they have to deal with an elderly man who has strangled his ch

programme.title: Toon In With Me
programme.desc: "Toony aspires to become a food critic with a little help from Bill!"

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: Wally makes the baseball team and Ward openly shows how proud he is of him, leaving Beaver feeling inferior. Trying to impress his parents, Beaver tries out for the band and begins practicing the clarinet. However, Beaver soon finds himself with more problems when he's let go from the band.

programme.title: Leave It to Beaver
programme.desc: June has Wally stay home from school when he comes down with a sore throat and suddenly Wally is immersed in attention from his parents, friends and doctor. Jealous and feeling left out, Beaver fakes illness, seeking that same attention.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Crippled Cougar
programme.desc: Mike Preston is a bitter man who despises Hugh Jamison because he mistakenly believes Jamison stole $100,000 from him and is responsible for him being crippled. Trying to entrap Jamison, Preston makes a mistake and is set up for murder by the real culprit.

programme.title: Matlock
programme.desc: When a prison guard is accused of murder, Matlock goes into the prison to defend him.

programme.title: In the Heat of the Night
programme.desc: Racial tensions run high when a married white woman has an affair with a black businessman from New York. Meanwhile Virgil is not happy when the Chief enlists his aid in tracking down Bubba's cousin, a suspected moonshiner.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Corabeth returns to her family home to help a dying aunt

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A broke young man seeks his fortune with an old drifter, a formerly legendary champion billiards player.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: A rich tycoon known for destroying anything that stands in his way vows to have the Ponderosa, no matter the cost.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Mark and Milly are held prisoner in her general store when two gunmen attempt a daring robbery.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: Two prison wagon drivers stop at the McCain ranch looking for whiskey. Lucas turns them down because they are escorting Rudy Croft, a murderer who is to be hanged in Yuma.

programme.title: Wagon Train
programme.desc: "When his wagon falls down a cliff, Davey Baxter's mother is killed, and his arm is crushed. The doctor is unavailable, so Chris is forced to make the decision to amputate. This changes everything for Davey and the girl he plans to marry."

programme.title: Emergency!
programme.desc: Swamped with paperwork, the paramedics are continually distracted by emergencies: a girl trapped in an overturned car, a beautician who has taken too many diet pills, an elderly man and workers stuck on a blazing ship.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: One of Margaret's nurses tries to hide her severe drinking problem, and Hawkeye is scorned after a practical joke he plays on Winchester backfires.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Colonel Potter nearly blows his stack when his well-intentioned colleagues mollycoddle him in order to lower his blood pressure.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: When Hawkeye can't stop a sneezing fit that has no apparent cause, psychiatrist Sidney Freedman digs into the surgeon's past for a clue to this unusual malady.

programme.title: M*A*S*H
programme.desc: Hawkeye is overcome by the devotion of a terminally ill G.I., who has leukemia, for his critically wounded buddy, but he has trouble coming to terms with the fact that he can't cure the man. Meanwhile, Father Mulcahy is worried about the impending visit of a Cardinal.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: As a sort of publicity stunt, the town decides to pull over the first car that drives through Mayberry and make its occupant the town's guest of honor. That lucky driver? A recently released convict.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
programme.desc: Traveling salesman Bert Miller is getting tired of traveling, so Andy and Barney plan to help him set up a small general goods shop on a vacant lot.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: When Pearl calls to yodel for him as a surprise, Jane suggests to Drysdale that he employs Pearl to be the head housekeeper, and when he suggests it to Pearl, she thinks he means marriage. And when Granny and Jed visit Mrs. Drysdale, who is going to a health spa, she says how Milburn is getting a more glamorous wife in her, but they think Drysdale is getting a brand new wife.

programme.title: Gomer Pyle, U.S.M.C.
programme.desc: Gomer accidentally takes a wrong turn on his way downtown and winds up on a round-trip jet flight to Rome.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.desc: Two German officers interfere with Hogan's operations when one tries to turn Stalag 13 into an officer's retirement home the other wants to use the facilities to interrogate the citizens of the local town.

programme.title: Hogan's Heroes
programme.sub-title: The Rise And Fall Of Sergeant Schultz
programme.desc: Hogan is stymied in the rescue of a captured member of the underground until a potential diversion appears in the form of an old WWI buddy of Sgt. Schultz.

programme.title: Carol Burnett and Friends
programme.desc: In The Family, Eunice and Mama stop by her husband's hardware store, only to get in another fight. Then, in Shower Blackout, Carol steps out of the shower singing "When Your Lover Has Gone". Finally, in The Oldest Man, Harvey gets his grandfather clock fixed by the Oldest Man.

programme.title: Perry Mason
programme.sub-title: The Case Of The Glittering Goldfish
programme.desc: An inventor of a cure for sick fish is charged with the murder of the purchaser of a pet fish store.

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: A widower buys a robotic grandmother for his three children.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: A pianist returns to his home town, hoping to mend a broken relationship with his father, and instead finds mystery and foreboding in everything he encounters.

programme.title: Alfred Hitchcock Presents
programme.desc: "A bank teller schemes the perfect plan."

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: Mannix goes undercover as a heroin addict to discover who's trying to kill an old friend.

programme.title: Cannon
programme.desc: Frank travels to a small ranching town to help out a writer friend charged with a double murder. Frank's only clue is a cryptic note left by the man's wife.

programme.title: Barnaby Jones
programme.desc: A pair of men pretending to be Barnaby and J.R. murder a writer employed by a publishing empire.

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: Other people's credit cards are found in the possession of a forest ranger.
